definition: poetic occasion/elegant situation/in literature, the cue for a poem
the final (of a syllable) (Chinese phonology)/rhyme/appeal/charm/(literary) pleasant sound
a charming man enjoys charming pursuits (idiom)

sentences.english: When you are single, your love affairs are hardly news.
sentences.chinese: 當你單身時，你的風流韻事是重要新聞。
男人所求的風流之韻事。

sentences.english: Kids, there's more than one story of how I met your mother.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們，在我遇到你老媽前風流韻事不止一次。
他們的風流韻事變得明顯了。

sentences.english: He always embellishes his romantic escapades.
sentences.chinese: 他總是大肆渲染他的風流韻事。

sentences.english: She will run on for hours about her romantic deeds.
sentences.chinese: 提起她的風流韻事她能連續講好幾個小時。

sentences.english: A romance happened in his family.
sentences.chinese: 他家裏發生了一件風流韻事。

sentences.english: It's difficult to head her off when she talked about her dissolute life.
sentences.chinese: 要是她談起她的風流韻事來，你就別想岔開她的話題。

sentences.english: Gallantry like that no longer exists.
sentences.chinese: 那樣的風流韻事不再存在了。

sentences.english: Her personal life set a Hollywood standard for glamour and tumult.
sentences.chinese: 她的個人生活成爲好萊塢風流韻事的標尺。

sentences.english: She achieved notoriety for her affair with the senator.
sentences.chinese: 她因爲和參議員的風流韻事而聲名狼藉。

sentences.english: Peter had many love-affairs before he married.
sentences.chinese: 彼得結婚前有過許多風流韻事。

sentences.english: There s dirt on the affair between Jessica abd the manager.
sentences.chinese: 關於傑西卡和經理之間的風流韻事，流言滿天飛。

sentences.english: You may be tempted to get involved in secret affairs or love triangles.
sentences.chinese: 可能會糾纏進風流韻事或者三角戀中。

sentences.english: There are rumours and slanders canarding about her romantic deeds.
sentences.chinese: 關於她的風流韻事有許多流言蜚語正在流傳着。
